title: SPA SHOK ULTRA 2 IN 1
long_description: SPA SHOK ULTRA 2 IN 1 is a pre-measured shock treatment that actively eliminates organic waste and maintains water clarity in a single weekly treatment. This re-activating treatment restores water’s sparkle while prolonging the effect of chlorine
short_description: BENEFITS Eliminates organic waste Maintains water clarity FORMAT Pouch of 40 G (12X40G)

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Sprinkle SPA SHOK ULTRA 2 IN 1 directly over the surface of the spa water. OR: Pour product directly into the skimmer basket.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: For each treatment, add one (40 g) pouch of SPA SHOK ULTRA 2 IN 1 per 1,500 L of water according to the chosen application method. Run the spa jets. Wait 30 minutes before using the spa.

dosage.specifications: One pouch treats up to 1,500 L of spa water. Use SPA SHOK ULTRA 2 IN 1 weekly to keep water crystal clear.

warning: DO NOT apply the product when people are in the spa. Rinse cartridge filters with fresh water each week. Cleaning cartridges monthly is recommended.
